name: YogifiBuddy
0:
”Alexa, Open Yogifi buddy”
”Alexa, start a new session with Yogifi buddy”
”Alexa, turn on the mat using Yogifi buddy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yogifi buddy
des: Yogifi buddy will guide you to schedule and start a sesesion to use the Yogifi mat. Yogifi mat is designed for various forms of exercises performed on the mat such as Yoga, Pilates etc., It helps users to track asanas, improve awareness and depth in practice. v0.2
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
